local_intent: Finalize transfer: re-detect red_plate, move above it, align, lower until contact, release white_plate, and retreat.
assumptions: White plate is held after prior Pick
Red plate position unchanged since perception
Workspace clear for lowering and retreat
coherence_with_global: Implements GLOBAL_BT steps: MoveAbove(red_plate) → LowerUntilContact → OpenGripper → Retreat; adds re-detection and timeouts for robustness, matching GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION transfer phase.
